title: Mahou Shoujo Lyrical Nanoha: Lyrical Toy Box
synopsis: The original video performed by hitomi (under the name Minami Hokuto) that inspired Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha. It is from Triangle Heart ~Lyrical Toy Box~, a merchandise CD released on June 29, 2001 for the eroge video game Triangle Heart 3.
related_anime: ['Triangle Heart: Sweet Songs Forever', 'Mahou Shoujo Lyrical Nanoha']
characters: ['Takamachi, Nanoha', 'Harlaown, Chrono', 'Tsukimura, Suzuka', 'Harlaown, Lindy', 'Takamachi, Miyuki', 'Ehrlichkeit, Noel K.', 'Takamachi, Kyouya', 'Tsukimura, Shinobu', 'Takamachi, Momoko']
